Description: (From the website) Embryonic Stem Cell Atlas from Pluripotency Evidence (ESCAPE) is a m/hESC-centered database that integrates data from many recent diverse high-throughput studies including: gene expression microarrays, RNA-seq, ChIP-chip/seq, genome-wide inhibitory RNA (RNAi) screens, immunoprecipitation followed by mass spectrometry (IP-MS) proteomics and phosphoproteomics.
